item.title: Unzip more than one file
item.description: Few days ago, I was trying to unzip a set of files and it did not work, so I looked up on the internet and found this very detailed post by Chris Jean that explains why 1 unzip path/*.zip gives you an error whereas 1 unzip 'path/*.zip' works like a charm! Thanks Chris!
